modName: Crafting cloud storage and retrieval - General Stores
summary: Automatic General Stores storage right from any crafting station.
descriptionHtml:
Get or store crafting material from your general stores cloud storage at any crafting station. When using the station for crafting automatically get all relevant items from storage. When you choose storage all applicable items are stored automatically and it opens the cloud storage inventory.

Supports forges, tanning racks, grindstones, armor tables, alchemy, enchanting, and cooking. Hearthfires ovens tba.

To enable returning all crafting mats to storage after using a crafting station open the console and type "set dienes_takeAfterUse to 1" (without the quotes). To revert it set it to 0.

Requires [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18340]General Stores[/url].
If you use Complete Crafting Overhaul Remade get [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58924/?]Niftbottle's compatibility patch[/url] to fix a crash.

For Skyrim SE check out [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/9045/?]glade8r64's port[/url]. They also have a [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/9055/?]Hearthfires storage mod[/url].

Does not make any world edits. Very lightweight footprint for max compatibility.

Consider checking out my other mods:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32339]Lootification[/url] Automatically enchant and distribute mod added weapons and armor.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25516]Two Rings[/url] Equip a second ring!
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33902]Transmogrification - Copy Armor Stats[/url] Look stylish and have progression.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33411]Dienes Durability Damager[/url] Durability for Skyrim. Also includes tempered/damaged items for npcs.
author: Dienes
